name: Maryanna Woodside
text: Overall, we had a great dining experience.  Service was quick and friendly.  Pizza was hot and good.  I wish they had mixed all the toppings all over the pizza instead of just putting one topping per three pieces, not a fan of that.  Our crust was burnt on the bottom as well.  Atmosphere was amazing, however.

name: Steph Mendez
text: They're always very nice here. Service sometimes can be delayed when they're busy. It seems they are short staffed

name: shirley rabenold
text: Pizza was old, dry and over cooked. But at least I didn't have to wait 20 minutes for my "hot & ready" pizzas. That was a first.

name: Jenniffer Cloud
text: Their hot and ready pizza was more stale and old. Crust very hard. But the kids behind the counter seemed to b very sweet

name: Aldeano Gordon
text: I liked the place but it was shutting down anyways

name: Rich Dewey
text: I'm sorry but I've gone here a few times and hoped that next time would be better. But this time was probably the worst. Stood there for almost 10 mins while some kid counts his drawer and another one paces back and forth in the front. No ‚Ä¶More

name: Tyler Kiukys
text: Great location, good management who seem to actually care, never had a bad experience.

name: BigSef90
text: I have literally been waiting 25 minutes for 2 pizzas and 3 people who came in after me left with their orders.  There are several options for quick food in the immediate area.  If you have to be anywhere or don‚Äôt want to wait, look elsewhere.

name: johnathan gist
text: Pizza wasn't ready! It was hot cause it was made to order. I was ready to pull in and pull out but had to wait. If not for waiting I would've gave them a 5 star.

name: kimmi7199
text: Ordered the new pretzel crust pizza when I walked in. Only waited a few min and I got a nice fresh hot pizza.

name: Seth Allen
text: The employees seem like they are bored out of their mind. I‚Äôve only seen a few that were a ‚Äúlittle‚Äù more cheery. Twice on 2 different occasions I‚Äôve ordered one thing and they gave me another. The second time it happened the pizza was old. ‚Ä¶More

name: Randy Fig
text: Dirty place. And employees handle food without using gloves

name: Next Step Environmental Services
text: Good Product=Great Value Always Friendly and the cheesy bread is a well kept secret

name: Ethan Ruoff
text: As much as I love the food, the service is hostile and ridiculously dysfunctional. One employee was yelling at customers and employees in frustration while slamming the fridge doors. In addition, I ordered my food an hour in advance for pickup and still had to wait over 15 minutes when I arrived in time. Someone needs to fix this.

name: Elizabeth McClay
text: Drove here only to find the place out of business. 0/5 stars.

name: methedemon
text: I was the only one at the store and still had to wait 25 minutes!  And the pizza wasn't even good. I usually like little Caesars but this location is bad.

name: Jon Hammett
text: Great, friendly staff and an excellent deal for lunch or dinner. Is it the best pizza in the world? No, but it is pretty close and it costs way less than other pizza chains that give you less value and quality for more of your money. I am a loyal Little Caesar's patron and I love the pizza. Yum, yum!

name: Kiana Escueta
text: Robert was professional and made my families night. He did not fail to satisfy our needs. I would 100% recommend this pizza place.

name: Dana Miller
text: This is the WORST little caesars ever. Pizza is never ever ready. Takes forever. Slow rude service. I can‚Äôt even believe it‚Äôs still in business.

name: ulrich5000
text: This place is so dysfunctional. The dude at the counter is just complaining to people how he hates Saturdays and how he wants to go home. A guy just walked in out of 7 people who ordered ahead of time and he still needs to wait. This is absolutely ridiculous.

name: Roger Lopez
text: They all make the pizza different and some of the employees need better hygiene

name: andrew gunderlock
text: Been here 3 times. Every time getting in and out, even if I'm the only one there, is painstakingly long. There's one kid there that's really nice and genuinely seems to be interested in getting his job done. Everyone else shouldn't be ‚Ä¶More

name: Wayne Wastler
text: Fast friendly service.  Kids loved the stuffed crust deep deep dish pizza

name: Heaven Barreto
text: Cashier was cursing in front of customers and i saw one of the employees literally hang up on a customer placing an order stating they were adking too many damn questions. Food took over 40 and they forgot part of my order. The cashier is just giving everything in front away for free and as a really bad attitude.

name: Moldy Taco
text: This place is friendly and fast they always have a smile on their faces

name: Awilda Gonzales
text: Never dissappointed with Little Ceasers pizza...the one with 4 or 5 different meats is absolutely incredible!!

name: Jim Paul
text: I don't know what happened here but this place fell apart. Takes 15 minutes for someone to come out and take your order. Online ordering hasn't been working in months yet they got posters all over the store for online ordering promo. Was good but terrible service now. Time to try a different location.

name: Alan Rogers
text: There was nothing hot and ready and too many people in front of me to wait it was lunch time for everybody

name: Michael Miranda
text: We ordered a 5 meats ahead and when went to pick up there was no 5 meats that we ordered that sucks bad for business!

name: Brian Johnson
text: 3 times in a row I have called in an order and when I picked it up, it was incorrect. It's not a complicated menu they offer, but the employees are totally inept. The I'm sorry we will make you another one doesn't work. I called ahead for a reason, why would I want to wait another 12 min for another one. Don't waste your time here.

name: Sergio Marzitelli
text: Little Caesars is great but DO NOT go to this location. First time I went, store was empty and I waited 10 minutes for my pizza, when I got home they gave me the wrong pizza. Just went back a second time, empty store, wait 10 minutes. I get home and the pizza is barely cooked. Just all doughy that i had to throw it away. Not going back.

name: Yinaira D√≠az Santiago
text: You usually don't wait a lot for the food and the staff are friendly. I prefer this one over any other from Allentown.
